div.a: Opt-In to Text Messaging from School Messenger

span.p: Our school utilizes the SchoolMessenger system to deliver text messages, straight to your mobile phone with important information about events, school closings, safety alerts and more.
Opt-In by texting the word Yes or the letter Y to the following number: 67587
Note: We must have your mobile number on file to receive text alerts.

a.title: Click to read more about: Opt-In to Text Messaging from School Messenger

span.p: Text trained CRISIS COUNSELORS about anything that is on your mind.

a.title: Click to read more about: Crisis Text Line
